errors.error_description: The installation command `pip3 install culebra --upgrade` uses the wrong package name. While the tool is known as Culebra, the package on PyPI is named `androidviewclient`.
correction_candidates: Change the package name in the command from `culebra` to `androidviewclient`.
Change the command to `pip3 install androidviewclient-culebra --upgrade`.
Use the GitHub repository directly: `pip3 install git+https://github.com/dtmilano/AndroidViewClient.git`.
Change the command to `pip3 install culebratester --upgrade`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the package name in the command from `culebra` to `androidviewclient`.
